thread.title: Quaint, friendly, fun and a terrific location
thread.title_full: Quaint, friendly, fun and a terrific location - Review of The Blakely New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: A N
title: Quaint, friendly, fun and a terrific location
text: This hotel was recommended by colleagues in the airline industry. For Broadway, Fifth Ave, Central Park, Museums and shopping this hotel has the perfect location. Small, tucked in to the middle of a block and attached to a very hip hamburger and milkshake restaurant where you can get a reservation and a table without waiting in line if you are staying in the Hotel! (Black Tap). Our room was a junior suite- long with a sitting area, a stocked mini bar and kurig coffee maker it was perfect. Continental breakfast from 7-10:30 comes with the room and is served In the restaurant. We ate in Black Tap one day for lunch and it's hamburgers and milkshakes are to die for!
